todoData.title: Radiology Data Retrieval for Sarah Miller

todos.text: Prepare radiology retrieval parameters for Sarah Miller

subTodos.text: Confirm patient identifier for Sarah Miller
Determine correct category code for radiology (e.g., LP29684-5)
Set modality filters (e.g., CT, MRI, X-Ray)
Set date filters or sorting preferences
Verify authentication token for API access
Execute HTTP request with prepared parameters
Check HTTP status code of the response
Extract and organize radiology report data
